name: ttest_onesample
desc: Test the difference in mean of a single sample with a population mean. It assumes that the sample is drawn from a normal distribution.
label: T-Test One-Sample

alt_hypothesis.label: Alternative Hypothesis
alt_hypothesis.desc: The alternative hypothesis to the null, returning specifically whether the result is less than, greater than, or .

alpha.label: Alpha
alpha.desc: The significance level. The probability of rejecting the null hypothesis when it is true.

mu.label: Population mean
mu.desc: The population mean, if it is known, else it defaults to 0.
